mapper.select: select a.content_id, a.body, a.created_date, a.user_email, b.hospital_qna_id, b.hospital_id, b.qna_type, b.c_group, d.name from content a, hospital_qna b, zalbazo_user c, hospital d where a.content_id = b.content_id and b.hospital_id = c.hospital_id and c.hospital_id = d.hospital_id and c.user_email = #{userEmail} order by c_group desc, hospital_qna_id asc
mapper.insert: insert all into content (CONTENT_ID, BODY, CREATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL) values (CONTENT_SEQ.nextval, #{body}, sysdate, 4, #{userEmail}) into hospital_qna (HOSPITAL_QNA_ID, HOSPITAL_ID, CONTENT_ID, QNA_TYPE, C_GROUP) values (HOSPITAL_QNA_SEQ.nextval, #{hospitalId}, CONTENT_SEQ.currval, 'A', #{cGroup}) select * from dual
